entry.title: London Boy & The Baby
entry.summary:
Author: Fan628

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,205Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 9

Summary: Buck moves from London to LA to live with a family friend that turn into his family. He’s studying to become a child psychologist, whilst trying to find true love in between meaningless hookups.Eddie Diaz moves to LA to be with his girlfriend and son after his first tour and getting shot. They end up breaking up leaving them to figure out how to co-parent together and Eddie to figure out his next career.

entry.title: you're the greatest thing we've lost
entry.summary:
Author: fallingthorns

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,636Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: Eddie feels his own eyes prickling as Buck’s cries turn into heavier sobs, his breath gasping between each as if there’s not enough oxygen in the world.“Eddie,” his fingers are clenching at Eddie’s shirt now, holding him tighter, closer. “Eddie, why – why –”“I don’t know,” Eddie whispers into his hair, lips grazing along Buck’s hairline with every word. “I don’t know. I’m so sorry.”“And – and you –” Buck trails off, even though Eddie desperately wants to hear what Buck has to say. He wants Buck to yell at him and tell him off for leaving, wants him to scream at him for being a terrible friend just so Eddie can feel – something. Anything. “You came back.”--Or, Buck breaks down.

entry.title: All the quiet places
entry.summary:
Author: sageevreeen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,599Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 37

Summary: New walls, old ghosts. Buck is trying to settle into a house that once felt like home, but the silence that follows him is heavier than the boxes he’s unpacking. A fight left words unsaid and distance that keeps stretching. He tells himself he’s fine, that distractions are enough. But some nights are quieter than others—and some silences cut deeper than they should. Or, Buck kisses Eddie before he leaves for El Paso. Buck struggles, falling into unhealthy coping mechanisms, and Eddie comes back to take care of him. Eventually, they find their way to each other—there’s a proposal, a wedding, and a promise that sticks.

entry.title: Two minutes of a Lifetime
entry.summary:
Author: TeenJulsie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,178Chapters: 1/7Kudos: 15

Summary: “Buck? What the hell are you okay?”Buck doesn’t answer. He just stares, pointing a shaky finger at the calendar like it’s something out of a nightmare“Eddie- ““What?” Eddie steps closer, careful not to step on the broken glass“Look!” Buck’s voice cracks as he jabs his finger against the date aggressively“What? What is i—”“N-no… that’s- that can’t be right” He whispers, staring at Buck, wide-eyed and horrifiedBuck swallows hard “2031. Eddie, it says 2031!”“No it’s- it must be a typo or- or I don’t know! Buck it’s 2021 not 2031! Where did you buy this from!?”“Me? We’re in your house!”****Or the one where Buck and Eddie survive a car crash, only to wake up ten years in the future, apparently…married to each other. As if that isn’t shocking enough for both of them, they come face-to-face with their future selves…and nothing about the future makes sense to them

entry.title: Let me tell you a story about war
entry.summary:
Author: diankn

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,628Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “You and me,” Buck starts. Stops. Wipes at his nose with his knuckle.“We've got a good thing going for us here, don’t we?”Eddie’s skin has turned clingy and wrinkled with sticky juice so he casts the core out and watches the seeds fly, ripped from still-clinging fruit flesh. They scatter as though skittish, sputtering atop the water's surface like child flung stones.For a moment, there is quiet. Then he says, “I suppose.”(or; A river, an offer, and a love that cannot prevail over fear.)

entry.title: every scrap of you would be taken from me
entry.summary:
Author: deanvrse

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,977Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 56

Summary: His throat tightens. It’s ridiculous, it’s so stupid, he tells himself. It’s carrots, not grief. It’s a pan, not loss. And he’s fine, he’s completely fine, he’s in therapy, he’s been keeping it together, he hasn’t cried, hasn’t broken down. Buck’s fine. or Bobby is gone. And this is how Buck and Eddie deal with their grief.

entry.title: Body Back
entry.summary:
Author: lyzard_fan_fics

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,301Chapters: 5/9Kudos: 169

Summary: Buck is dealing with the breakup just fine, thank you very much. Losing Tommy hurt like hell, but he would be okay like he always was after heartbreak. Even as he starts to talk about the relationship, things that went wrong, the things that just never seemed to click, things that make him angry and panicked, he tells himself that those feelings are normal after a serious relationship ends. It's normal to feel resentful, and mad, and betrayed, and horribly disgusted.Except according to his friends and family, that is all very, very NOT normal.Or a messy vent fic based on the song Body Back by Brye, where Buck has to slowly realize being coerced and pressured into sex by your partner isn't normal and is very much sexual assault. With a side of protective and enraged Eddie who wants nothing more than to heal all of Buck's hurt.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Obviously, this is not canon or anywhere near it. I don't hate Tommy's character and I don't think he'd ever do this, this is simply a vent fic that I could easily slot him into.

entry.title: All the Magic I Have Known (I've Had to Make Myself)
entry.summary:
Author: WhenTheLastStoneFalls

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,357Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 31

Summary: “This is what happens when you try to get away from me, Maddie. People get hurt.”A gunshot rang in the air. Sophia felt a sharp jerk of pain in her shoulder as she ducked down. A blur of movement flashed through the air as she fell to the ground.—After a virus wipes out roughly half of the population, Buck, Eddie, and the 118 navigate a new reality, where getting Chris home seems impossible, finding Maddie seems improbable, and hiding their shifter/human relationship from Gerrard becomes more complicated as each day passes.Set sometime after the beginning of Season 2.

entry.title: forever winter (if you go)
entry.summary:
Author: softletters

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,646Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 317

Summary: “Goodbye?” Eddie reiterates out loud. “Won’t I… see you tomorrow? Tonight, even?” “Hard to do all the way from Texas, you know. I suppose we could video call, but that doesn’t compare to the real thing, and–” Buck rambles on and wildly gestures with his hands and Eddie isn’t even sure he knows what the words coming out of his mouth even mean. “Texas? What are you talking about, why would you be going to Texas?” Eddie scrunches his nose and Buck pretends that looking to the side is more interesting than looking at him. “You know I can’t go to Texas, I mean, if- if you asked, I’d come, but–” Buck is not making any sense. “Why would I ask you to go to Texas?” Or, Buck thinks Eddie came back just for Bobby's funeral. Eddie is confused.

entry.title: Fri(end)s
entry.summary:
Author: msteen02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,972Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 65

Summary: Eddie was finally exactly where he wanted to be. He was on cloud nine after confessing his feelings for Buck, and Buck returning his confession with enthusiasm. He loved his family, and as they sat there on the couch watching a movie, Chris cuddled up on one side of him and Buck on the other, he could finally look forward to the future rather than getting hung up on the past. With Chris and Buck by his side, he couldn’t wait to explore their relationship as a family, and move on together towards the rest of their lives.OrA 5+1 story of Buck and Eddie exploring their developing relationship together, taking their time to figure out how to transition from being best friends to boyfriends, before finally breaking the news to their family at the 118.
